InstructionData.Title: PSYNC5 - 5-way Power Synchronizer
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions:
# 5-way Power Synchronizer # Model: PSYNC5-100 alias Source d0​ alias Dest1 d1​ alias Dest2 d2​ alias Dest3 d3​ alias Dest4 d4​ alias Dest5 d5​
start:​ l r0 Source On​ brdns​ d1 2 s d1 On r0 brdns​ d2 2 s d2 On r0 brdns​ d3 2 s d3 On r0 brdns​ d4 2 s d4 On r0 brdns​ d5 2 s d5 On r0 yield​ j start
